players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any clues we may have."
Bob: "I agree Diana, Charlie's death is concerning. We need to work together to find the killer among us. Does anyone have any information that might help us?"
Diana: "I remember Charlie mentioning that he had received some threatening messages before his death. We should share any suspicious messages we've received to help us identify the culprit."
Bob: "I haven't received any threatening messages myself. Diana, can you tell us more about what Charlie said about these messages? Any details about when he got them or what they said?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
